revision.text: {{Talk header}} {{Old AfD multi|votepage={{{1|{{PAGENAME}}}}}||result='''{{{2|Speedy delete and redirect to [[Steve Irwin]] - created by a banned user}}}'''}} {{WikiProject banner shell|blp=yes|1= {{WikiProject Biography|living=yes|class=C|listas=Irwin, Bindi Sue}} {{WikiProject Australia|television=yes|class=C|importance=low|QLD=yes|QLD-importance=low}} {{WikiProject Zoo|class=C}} {{WikiProject Women|class=C}} }} {{Archive box|[[Talk:Bindi Irwin/archive1]]}} ==Impossible facts== "Bindi made her first television appearance on the The Rosie O'Donnell Show in 1989." There is no way that is possible if she was born in 1998. I'm thinking that's a typo, but honestly that entire sentance should be removed. It doesn't belong where it is placed, and has no relevance to the article as a whole. [[User:69.66.91.45|69.66.91.45]] 04:48, 21 January 2007 (UTC) *It's a typo. Bindi's parents DID bring her with them on the TV show a matter off months after she was born.--[[User:Marhawkman|Marhawkman]] 04:45, 31 May 2007 (UTC) **For that matter, her birth was filmed and is featured in the Crocodile Hunter series (episode 1) [[User:Youcantryreachingme|youcantryreachingme]] 11:36, 7 August 2007 (UTC) ) ==I have a recent photo== I have a photo from January 2007 which I could make available for this article. It can be seen at the bottom of [[http://www.wherelightmeetsdark.com/index.php?module=pagemaster&PAGE_user_op=view_page&PAGE_id=58 this page]] - click for larger version. I have no experience with contributing photos to Wikipedia, however. Would anyone like to fast-track me? (use contact form on that site (under "WLMD" menu), or user talk page here on wikipedia) [[User:Youcantryreachingme|youcantryreachingme]] 12:40, 17 July 2007 (UTC) I have just added to the article. [[User:Youcantryreachingme|youcantryreachingme]] 13:55, 17 July 2007 (UTC) ==Bindi overworked== Hi I was just wondering why there are no references on this wikipage abut worrys that she is being over worked because of family worrys that busness will slowly die off at there zoo since her dad passed away? --[[User:MattyC3350|MattyC3350]] 09:48, 30 October 2007 (UTC) :I would imagine no such reference would exist, as basically that would involve her mother, or someone closely connected to her, publicly stating, "Bindi is overworked because we're worried we won't have jobs if she slows down." Which of course, would never be said to the public even if it WERE true. :Personally, I would think that continuing Steve's work is proving helpful with the grieving period to a young girl who's lost her father. I was the same age when I lost my father unexpectedly, and I floundered around feeling helpless and hopeless. Eight year old kids don't usually have much "power of action" and so I think people should admire what she's doing. She needs to do it, in a very real way that few people can understand. When and if it gets to the point that being Bindi, Defender of Wildlife" is no longer helping her situation, I think you can well assured she'll quit as a television personality. —Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[Special:Contributions/209.30.198.96|209.30.198.96]] ([[User talk:209.30.198.96|talk]]) 16:10, 3 November 2007 (UTC) ::"Bindy the Jungle Girl" or "Bindy the Meal Ticket"? Now that Steve ain't supporting the wife and kids. —Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[Special:Contributions/69.253.38.199|69.253.38.199]] ([[User talk:69.253.38.199|talk]]) 09:36, 26 November 2007 (UTC) ==Thanksgiving's Day Parade== Hello. I was just writing because i believe that I saw her in the thanksgiving day parade performing a song about endangered animals but it does not say anything about this in the actual article. Is it not relevent? I believe that it was a great milestone in her career and should be mentioned. —Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[Special:Contributions/68.114.55.102|68.114.55.102]] ([[User talk:68.114.55.102|talk]]) 17:33, 29 December 2007 (UTC) :Probably because you havent provided a reference to anywhere that it can be verified. If you register your details and follow some of the articles on how to edit the pages, we would encourage you to contribute your knowledge to documenting that event. [[User:Andmark|Andmark]] ([[User talk:Andmark|talk]]) 04:59, 20 March 2008 (UTC) == This is not an article == This seems to have been copied from somewhere, i think it should be deleted —Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[User:Mangoman34|Mangoman34]] ([[User talk:Mangoman34|talk]] • [[Special:Contributions/Mangoman34|contribs]]) 20:27, 29 October 2008 (UTC) == Do we really need the bit about her "dating" life? == The child is eleven for Christ's sake, not valid or notable for anyone but pedophiles. [[Special:Contributions/72.95.208.133|72.95.208.133]] ([[User talk:72.95.208.133|talk]]) 17:40, 27 February 2010 (UTC) :I agree and I just removed the recently-added "personal life" section. The reference was [http://womansday.ninemsn.com.au/celebrity/inthemag/1015231/meet-bindi-irwins-boyfriend this] which states that the two people concerned live in different countries, so it seems reasonable to conclude that the information is not suitable for an encyclopedic article. [[User:Johnuniq|Johnuniq]] ([[User talk:Johnuniq|talk]]) 23:02, 27 February 2010 (UTC) In 2010 she is in her movie of Free Willy Escape from Pirates Cove.She plays Kirra Cooper.she goes along with Beau Bridges as Gus Grisby. —Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[Special:Contributions/76.99.216.67|76.99.216.67]] ([[User talk:76.99.216.67|talk]]) 01:32, 27 March 2010 (UTC) ==dirtgirlworld== I actually own a fansite for Bindi and one of our admins posted information about Bindi and dirtgirlworld. I was promptly emailed by the creator of dirtgirlworld that Bindi is not affiliated with them in any way (voice, presenter, etc.), and I removed the news item and posted about what happened. This is a rumor that has been going around the web for a while now, but it isn't true. [[User:Stephe1987|Stephe1987]] ([[User talk:Stephe1987|talk]]) 06:19, 20 May 2011 (UTC) ==Age and status as philosopher== i think "espouses the conservationist philosophy as her parents" is a somewhat overblown statement to apply to a childs point of view. Can we at least wait a couple years before applying such language? Ive no doubt she is committed to conservation, but she is not old enough to be considered a philosopher, only an advocate.(mercurywoodrose)[[User:Mercurywoodrose|Mercurywoodrose]] ([[User talk:Mercurywoodrose|talk]]) 06:42, 9 July 2011 (UTC) Philosophy following makes you a philosopher it does not. - Yoda — Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[Special:Contributions/220.253.81.172|220.253.81.172]] ([[User talk:220.253.81.172|talk]]) 11:06, 29 November 2011 (UTC) Epistemologically, it's not sensible to pronounce s.o. to be sharing (or espousing) a philosophy, especially one so easily attributed even to historical personalities, just by subjectively and personally relating that subject to that generalization. Even with the (very broad) term 'philosophy' that semms to be employed here, it just doesn't make any sense, besides not being quoted or related or whatever. cheers. — Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[Special:Contributions/93.222.28.92|93.222.28.92]] ([[User talk:93.222.28.92|talk]]) 01:03, 19 August 2012 (UTC) == Bindi Irwin's perfect scores, 7 or 8? == There is a discrepancy. We state "the most perfect scores with seven", but I count eight, and [http://www.enstarz.com/articles/122179/20151125/dwts-cast-winner-how-bindi-irwin-made-history-broke-records-this-season-with-derek-hough.htm this source] also says eight. Which is it? -- [[User:BullRangifer|BullRangifer]] ([[User talk:BullRangifer|talk]]) 05:27, 30 November 2015 (UTC) : I see that there is a hidden editorial note at [[Dancing with the Stars (U.S. season 21)]] : What justification do we have for counting in this manner? Is there a RS from the official DWTS organization regarding this? -- [[User:BullRangifer|BullRangifer]] ([[User talk:BullRangifer|talk]]) 06:06, 30 November 2015 (UTC) == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just added archive links to {{plural:1|one external link|1 external links}} on [[Bindi Irwin]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=700290030 my edit]. If necessary, add {{tlx|cbignore}} after the link to keep me from modifying it. Alternatively, you can add {{tlx|nobots|deny{{=}}InternetArchiveBot}} to keep me off the page altogether. I made the following changes: *Added archive https://web.archive.org/20071211202334/http://www.news.com.au:80/heraldsun/story/0,,20351375-5005961,00.html to http://www.news.com.au/heraldsun/story/0,,20351375-5005961,00.html When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' to let others know. {{sourcecheck|checked=false}} Cheers.—[[User:Cyberbot II|cyberbot II]][[User talk:Cyberbot II|Talk to my owner]]:Online 16:43, 17 January 2016 (UTC) == books == I was hoping to find a list of the books she's authored, since Wikipedia is so often a great source for that information, particularly because it lists titles without cover photos, so it is easy to copy/paste to a document for tracking titles read. Unfortunately, there isn't even a mention of her having written any books at all. Thanks, [[Special:Contributions/75.165.70.33|75.165.70.33]] ([[User talk:75.165.70.33|talk]]) 02:59, 20 April 2016 (UTC)Jennifer
